Text:
the wifes been hounding me for weeks with 'see if holyroses has posted the rite yet'!

use the big stuff for my wifes ipad, and the small stuff for my galaxy tab, and there always awesome, mucho respect and thanks

Won't work on my 360 and my cpu is too outdated to play anything of nice quality :(. 

From what I can see on my cpu though, it'd be:

A/9
V/9.5
thanks for the multiple audio and subtitles holyroses
it should play easily on any pentium IV class machine or higher.  use vlc.
